document_data.mainbody:
ang was a member of the Marsember Watch in Cormyr during the late 15 century DR. He was Kleef Kenrics first blade.
He was a loyal and dedicated watchman, who lived an honorable life. He had notable skill as a swordsman.
Unique among his comrades in the Watch, Jang wielded a sleek katana.
Jang had a good relationship with his superior officer, Topsword Kleef Kenric, and could regularly be relied upon to carry out important tasks.
On Uktar 2 of the , Jang was part of a contingent of Marsember Watch and House Seasilver guards who accompanied Kleef Kenric Arietta Seasilver and two Chosen, Malik el Sami, follower of Cyric, and Joelle Emmeline, follower of Sune, out of Marsember in order to fulfill their mission to rescue Elira Seasilver.
During their sea voyage, he was the only watchman to stay behind when all the other watchmen tried to deceive Prince Yder Tanthul and his men into believing that the Eye of Gruumsh was with them. With the Shadovar busy, Jang, Kleef, and the others assaulted the Wave Wyvern, a vessel the Shadovar had commandeered. Afterward, Jang and the other watchmen were tasked with taking Ariettas mother, who had been the Shadovars prisoner, to safety.
